info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mesh-rpc - RPC Operations
info.description:
This module contains a collection of definitions for
     Wireless Mesh Remote Procedure Calls.
     Copyright (c) 2021-2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

**Module:** `Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mesh-rpc`
**Version:** 2023-07-01
**Operations:** 21

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mesh-rpc - RPC Operations.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mesh-rpc - RPC Operations.yang)

post.summary: Configure ethernet daisy chain super root on a mesh AP
post.description:
Configure ethernet daisy chain super root on a mesh AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rap-eth-daisychain-super-root`

post.summary: Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP on 5GHz band
post.description:
Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP on 5GHz band

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:rrm-80211a-channel-update-mesh`

post.summary: Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP on 2.4GHz band
post.description:
Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP on 2.4GHz band

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:rrm-80211b-channel-update-mesh`

post.summary: Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP in bridge group on 5GHz band
post.description:
Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP in bridge group on 5GHz band

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:rrm-80211a-channel-update-mesh-bgn`

post.summary: Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP in bridge group on 2.4GHz band
post.description:
Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for all RAP in bridge group on 2.4GHz band

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:rrm-80211b-channel-update-mesh-bgn`

post.summary: Perform link test between 2 bridge mode APs
post.description:
Perform link test between 2 bridge mode APs

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:exec-linktest-ap`

dst-ap-mac.description: Radio MAC address of the destination AP

pkt-size.description: Size of packets for link test

post.summary: Delete the provisioned PSK key on a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Delete the provisioned PSK key on a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-security-psk-provisioning-delete`

post.summary: Configure the preferred parent of a mesh AP
post.description:
Configure the preferred parent of a mesh AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-preferred-parent-ap`

mac-address.description: Radio MAC address of the preferred parent

post.summary: Configure daisy chain mode on a mesh AP
post.description:
Configure daisy chain mode on a mesh AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-daisy-chain-mode`

post.summary: Configure strict daisy chain on a mesh AP
post.description:
Configure strict daisy chain on a mesh AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-daisy-chain-strict-rap`

post.summary: Configure block child mode on a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure block child mode on a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-block-child`

post.summary: Configure the backhaul radio of a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure the backhaul radio of a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-bhaul-radio`

post.summary: Configure the backhaul transmission parameters of a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure the backhaul transmission parameters of a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-bhaul-tx-rate`

data-rate.description: 802.11 data rate. Set to AUTO or manually select 802.11abg/n/ac

post.summary: Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for RAP on 2.4GHz band
post.description:
Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for RAP on 2.4GHz band

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:rrm-80211b-ap-rrm-channel-update-mesh`

post.summary: Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for RAP on 5GHz band
post.description:
Trigger RRM DCA run for Mesh backhaul for RAP on 5GHz band

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:rrm-80211a-ap-rrm-channel-update-mesh`

post.summary: Configure the trunk VLAN port on a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure the trunk VLAN port on a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-trunking-vlan`

vlan-id.description: VLAN ID to be configured on primary port

post.summary: Configure VLAN trunking on a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure VLAN trunking on a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-trunking`

post.summary: Configure access VLAN on a bridge mode AP ethernet port
post.description:
Configure access VLAN on a bridge mode AP ethernet port

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-ethernet-access-vlan`

flag.description: Enable/Disable access mode for an ethernet port

port-num.description: Ethernet port number to be configured

vlan-id.description: Set VLAN ID of access port. 0 is the default VLAN

post.summary: Configure backhaul primary ethernet port of a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure backhaul primary ethernet port of a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-bh-primary-ethernet-port`

post.summary: Configure native VLAN for a trunk ethernet port on a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure native VLAN for a trunk ethernet port on a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-ethernet-trunk-native-vlan`

flag.description: Enable/Disable trunk mode for an ethernet port

port-num.description: Ethernet port number to be configured

vlan-id.description: Set native VLAN ID of trunking port

post.summary: Configure allowed VLAN for a trunk ethernet port on a bridge mode AP
post.description:
Configure allowed VLAN for a trunk ethernet port on a bridge mode AP

**Endpoint:** `POST /restconf/operations/wireless_mesh_rpc:set-rad-mesh-ethernet-trunk-allowed-vlan`

flag.description: Add/remove allowed VLAN to/from trunk port

port-num.description: Ethernet port number of trunk port

vlan-id.description: Set allowed VLAN ID of trunk port. 0 is the default VLAN
